__e: Great, his football game got rained out, and now he wants to bring the whole team here. Wants me to order pizza.
I'm glad that the flight was canceled, so now I can tell you I want you to go.
The marriage is off and if anyone asks, I dumped you.
And I'm sorry I called off the wedding and I want you back.
He mentions something about cancelling breakfast with him.
We should have called the wedding off sooner, but I was trying to make everyone happy- everyone except myself.
What bothers me, sir, is you said that he cancelled his appointment.
So, I... I guess I should have canceled that party after all, huh?
